translations: 蠕动；扭动；感到痛苦；感到苦恼

phrs.translation: 高级特技飞行；绞出；扭干
浑身湿透；(衣服)湿得拧得出水来

sentences.sentence: He turned away to wring out the wet shirt.
sentences.translation: 他转身去拧干那件湿衬衫。

sentences.sentence: Just a twist of the handle is all it takes to wring out the mop.
sentences.translation: 只需旋转一下那个手柄就可以拧干拖把。

sentences.sentence: Buyers use different ruses to wring free credit out of their suppliers.
sentences.translation: 买主们想方设法从他们那些供应商那里获取无息赊购。
